name: Kickass Torrents - Midnight Theme (Kat.cr)
description: Dark theme to ease the eyes and make long browsing sessions more comfortable. Nothing drastic changed; The layout is the same, mostly just re-colouring and some tweaks.
additional_info:
Contact info: https://kat.cr/user/Kyle-E/ You need an add-on called Stylish to use custom styles: Firefox - https://addons.mozilla.org/en-GB/firefox/addon/stylish/ Chrome - https://chrome.google.com/webstore/detail/stylish/fjnbnpbmkenffdnngjfgmeleoegfcffe ______________________________________________________________________________________________ Changelog: Update 27.06.16
  • Removed a:visited.
Update 25.06.16
  • Updated the source location of "torrentDownloaded" icon indicator.
  • Updated the code for torrent search.
Update 09.06.16
  • Updated achievement images source location.
Update 31.05.16
  • Fixed and updated "search suggestions" box after kat.cr's new CSS update.
  • Chrome: Styled input placeholder for webkit browsers. So the Search query text on the search box will no longer be grey but in the colour that was intended.
Update 29.05.16
  • Updated chat-box to fit kat.cr's new CSS update.
  • Re-styled Report a bug button.
Update 13.04.16
  • Updated chat-box's close & minimize buttons.
  • Styled chat-bar.
  • Added #333 background colour to preview box.
Update 10.04.16
  • Fixed land-login transparency.
  • Updated the chat-box.
